nodes.text: Saberfish were a species of enormous fish native to the storm seas of Tibrin. During the High Republic Era, a countess from Abregado-rae ordered a saberfish for her private aquarium, which was transported to Abregado at great difficulty by the freighter Legacy Run. The starship then transported the saberfish back to Tibrin a few cycles later after it became ill because the countess' people did not know how to care for it, a journey which the noblewoman paid full freight on.

Saberfish were mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi. A preliminary excerpt of the novel released on IGN identified the fish as coming from Spira, but this was changed to Tibrin in the final version.
